info.description: A Hexagonal Architecture E-Commerce API with product variations support
info.title: E-Commerce API

get.description: Retrieves the current user's shopping cart

post.description: Converts the user's cart to an order
Adds a product to the user's shopping cart

delete.description: Removes all items from the user's shopping cart

put.description: Updates the quantity of an item in the user's shopping cart

delete.description: Removes an item from the user's shopping cart

get.description: Get a list of notifications for the current user

post.description: Create a new notification (admin only)

get.description: Get the count of unread notifications for the current user

put.description: Mark all notifications as read for the current user

post.description: Send a notification about an order status change
Send a notification about a payment
Send a notification about shipping
Send a system notification to a user

get.description: Get a list of notification templates (admin only)

post.description: Create a new notification template (admin only)

get.description: Get a notification template by ID (admin only)

put.description: Update an existing notification template (admin only)

get.description: Get a notification by ID

put.description: Mark a notification as archived
Mark a notification as read

post.description: Create a new payment method for a customer

get.description: Get a customer payment method by ID

put.description: Update an existing customer payment method
Set a payment method as the default for a customer

get.description: Get a list of payment methods for a customer
Get a list of payment gateways

post.description: Create a new payment gateway

get.description: Get a payment gateway by ID

put.description: Update an existing payment gateway

get.description: Get a list of available payment methods

post.description: Create a new payment method

get.description: Get a payment method by ID

put.description: Update an existing payment method

post.description: Process a payment for an order
Refund a payment for an order

get.description: Verify a payment transaction

post.description: Calculate shipping costs for a set of items to a specific country

get.description: Get a list of available shipping methods

post.description: Create a new shipping method

get.description: Get a shipping method by ID

put.description: Update an existing shipping method

get.description: Get a list of shipping rates

post.description: Create a new shipping rate

get.description: Get a shipping rate by ID

put.description: Update an existing shipping rate

get.description: Get a list of shipping zones

post.description: Create a new shipping zone

get.description: Get a shipping zone by ID

put.description: Update an existing shipping zone

get.description: Retrieves the current user's wishlist
Checks if a product is in the user's wishlist
get.summary: Check if product is in wishlist

post.description: Adds a product to the user's wishlist

delete.description: Removes all items from the user's wishlist
Removes an item from the user's wishlist

get.description: Get a paginated list of categories with optional filtering

post.description: Create a new category with the provided details

get.description: Get all top-level categories (with no parent)
Get detailed information about a category by its slug
Get detailed information about a category by its ID

put.description: Update an existing category with the provided details

delete.description: Delete a category by its ID

get.description: Get all direct child categories of a parent category
Get products in a category and optionally its subcategories
Get a complete category tree starting from a root category
Get a list of orders with optional filtering and pagination

post.description: Create a new order for a customer

get.description: Get a list of orders for a specific customer
Get detailed information about an order by its ID

put.description: Update the quantity of an item in an order

post.description: Add a product variation to an existing order
post.summary: Add an item to an order

delete.description: Remove a product variation from an order
delete.summary: Remove an item from an order

put.description: Set payment information for an order
Update the status of an order
Set shipping tracking information for an order

get.description: Get a list of products with optional filtering and pagination

post.description: Create a new product with the provided details

get.description: Get a list of products in a specific category
Get detailed information about a product by its ID

put.description: Update an existing product's details

delete.description: Delete a product by its ID

put.description: Update the stock quantity of a product

get.description: Get a list of users with optional role filtering and pagination

parameters.description: Filter by user role (customer or admin)
parameters.name: role

post.description: Authenticate a user and return a JWT token

get.description: Get the profile of the currently authenticated user

post.description: Register a new user account
Saves OTP Inside redis and send send it to phone number

get.description: Get detailed information about a user by their ID

put.description: Update a user's profile information

get.description: Get all addresses for a user

post.description: Add a new address for a user

put.description: Update an existing address for a user

delete.description: Delete an address for a user

put.description: Set an address as the default for a user

get.description: Get all orders for a specific user

put.description: Change a user's password

categories.description: Category IDs the product belongs to

is_new.description: Indicates if the user is new and needs to change to false after user updates their profile

phone_number.description:
Email    string `json:"email" binding:"required,email"`
Password string `json:"password" binding:"required"`
